thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Bill Taylor

author: Bill Taylor
title: Bill Taylor
text: I have been a customer of Servcorp's Riparian Plaza, Brisbane, branch for the past 4 years. A divestment of a business required us to outsource our front office services which led me to Servcorp. From the outset the team at Riparian Plaza have been incredible. Professional in every aspect of their operation, I wish I had found them earlier. Shelly and the team add enormous value to our current operations. They are literally part of the family now. They deserve every accolade that comes their way, not that that's what motivates them. Representing your business positively to your clients and prospects is what drives them. The pleasure continues to be mine, and our customers of course.
